ComicInfo.Summary:
The Big Greasy: Escaped prisoner Garson makes the mistake of stopping at a roadhouse run by an odd Cajun couple.
Scary-Go-Round: Carousel owner Trent Velker needs long-time carousel operator Horace Ames out of the way so he can sell the carousel.
Horror You Today: Benevolent alien Prof. Zschieche possesses Dr. Hayden Greel to prevent him from irrevocably harming the universe.
Sore Spot: Prof. Zschieche relates the horrible danger the universe would have been exosed to if he hadn’t stopped Dr. Greel from building his space/time teleporter.
Caged In!: Bank teller Suzy convinces lovesick fellow employee Jim to break into the bank vault and rob it.
